data.description:
Den muslimske kvinde er undertrykt. Hun er undertrykt i sin påklædning, i sociale relationer, på den politiske scene, og i hendes seksualitet. For at komme ud af denne ondskab må hun befries af feminismens tankesæt. Det er i hvertfald nutidens velkendte mantra og postulat.

Feminismen er i manges øjne synonym med befrielse, frihed, og ligestilling. Det er næppe et fænomen man kan sige noget om, før man beskyldes for at være kvindehader, eller partriakalsk. Men hvad er feminisme i virkeligheden? Hvad er grobundet for den feministiske filosofi? Og er feminisme kompatibel med Islam? Hvad siger Islam om spørgsmål omkring køn? Og er det rigtigt at Islam undertrykker kvinder? Og hvad med “Muslim feminism”? 

Udforsk Islam & Salsabil inviterer til et endagsarrangement for både brødre og søstre om Feminisme set med Islamiske briller, hvor ovenstående spørgsmål og mange flere vil komme under behandling. 

Kom og deltag, ta’ en ven/veninde med, og byd endelig ind med dine kritiske spørgsmål til arrangementet. 

Der vil også være mulighed for køb af delikatesser til den søde tand :)

Eine feministische Politik rückt die radikale Verwundbarkeit der Einzelnen in den Fokus. Wird durch ihre Anerkennung als universelles Risiko eine umfassende Demokratisierung möglich? Andreea Zelinka, Anthropologin, Wien

Do you believe in gender equality and rights for all? Then you, friend, are a feminist! Feminism may sound like it only matters to women, but it certainly does not! It affects us all!

Charlotte NOW will have Feminism Open Mic Night on Wednesday, December 6 at Letty's on Shamrock.Letty's is a female owned bistro and bar in Plaza Midwood specializing in comfort food and a comfortable atmosphere. Come share a joke, a story, a passion, a favorite reading or a song that relates to the theme of feminism! This is not just for members so invite your friends! This is not just for females because feminism affects us all! Carl McIntyre and friends will also be providing live music for us. Come join us for an evening of fun and entertainment! 

And don't forget to bring donations for our sisters in Changed Choices who are transitioning out of prison. The transition house needs cleaning supplies, detergent, paper goods, twin sheet sets, shelf stable food items, grocery cards, feminine hygiene products, towels and pillows.  Paper towels, laudry detergent, Kleenex and plastic clothes hangars are always needed!!

Open Mic will be held at Letty's 2121 Shamrock Drive Charlotte 28205. It's beside Pike's and across the street from Shamrock Elementary School. 

Be sure to check out this great video about feminism open mic night at the Wild Iris! https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zZ909eyKWGg

data.description:
Den 9e december är det premiär för SUF Uppsalas nattcafé! Tillsammans skapar vi en gratis, nykter och kvällsöppen mötesplats för ungdomar och andra.
Schema:
17.00 dörrar öppnas, häng, mat och fika, musik
18.00 Antifascisterna
19.30 Föreläsning om internfeminism
20.00 Demonstrationsworkshop

Cash is king! Vi ses :)

ANTIFASCISTERNA
2013 attackerar beväpnade nazister en antirasistisk demonstration i Kärrtorp där flera skadas. I Grekland blir nazistpartiet Gyllene gryning tredje största parti i valet och 2014 i Malmö skadas flera personer i samband med en demonstration på 8 mars varav en, Showan Shattak, hamnar i koma efter en brutal knivattack av personer ur den högerextrema rörelsen.

I ANTIFASCISTERNA målas ett porträtt upp av en rörelse som vägrar betraktas som offer. Ett flertal olika personer i Sverige och Grekland berättar om sin syn på radikal politisk organisering mot högerextremism, samtidigt som vi får en bakgrund till varför Sverige och Grekland, två till ytan så olika länder, har högerextrema rörelser som genom våld påverkar samhället.

FÖRELÄSNING OM INTERNFEMINISM
En stående punkt på dagordningen bör för många autonoma organisationer vara internfeminism. Antifascismen har ofta varit en rörelse där det varit enkelt att ta plats som man, men antifascismen är inte en arena enbart för män. Istället för att låta den patriarkala tendensen frodas måste vi organisera oss och verka för jämställdhet internt - därav namnet. Internfeminismen är bland annat att en löpande diskussion om hur jämställdheten ser ut inom organisationen och vilka som kommer till tals i diskussioner, samt vad man kan göra åt det. En medlem i SUF kommer tala om feminism basics och varför det är av högsta vikt att ha en jämställd klubb, hur vi har arbetat internfeministiskt i praktiken och vilka erfarenheter vi har fått från att ha haft ett aktivt internfeministiskt arbete.

DEMONSTRATIONSWORKSHOP
Snart är det valår, och då lär fulingarna försöka göra sig själva plats på våra gator och torg igen. Förstås kan vi inte låta dem göra det, och då är det jättebra att vara väl förberedd. Workshopen kommer gå igenom vad en demonstration egentligen är, hur man ska förbereda sig, hur en vängrupp fungerar, historia om polisens taktik vid demonstrationer och vilken taktik de använder idag. Det kommer även vara en del juridik, do's and dont's och annat kul.

Tillgänglighet: Bottenplan med trappor och ramp.
Allergier: Allt som serveras är helvegetariskt och nötfritt.

Mer information om föreläsare och schema släpps snart!
Kom hungriga!
data.name: Nattcafé: Feminism och antifascism

FavourEconomy is being exhibited at George Paton Gallery and participating in ‘Doing Feminism / Sharing the World’ curated by Professor Anne Marsh this coming December in Melbourne.
 
EXHIBITION
FavourEconomy:Stations will present audio recordings shared by over 80 women in a public but intimate listening environment at George Paton Gallery. Multiple headsets placed on 24 separate chairs play the sound files on a randomised and continuous loop. Each chair is a site specific offering conceived  by a contributor as a symbolic representation of themselves and their art practice - otherwise these are simply a seat that a contributor would like the visitor to sit on while listening. A series of public programs and performances will accompany the exhibition, see below and event links for further details.

RESIDENCY PROGRAM

DOING FEMINISM / SHARING THE WORLD 
Norma Redpath House
4 Painsdale Place, Cartlon VIC

From Dec 18-24 FavourEconomy will being Residence at Norma Redpath House as part of  Doing Feminism/ Sharing the World curated by Professor Anne Marsh and Caroline Phillips. FavourEconomy Contributors and those interested in participating are invited to join FavourEconomy in residence to engage with the project in more depth. During the residency audience responses and audio favour data will be investigated to provide the basis for a new text-based projection artwork - mentored by Lyndal Jones. This residency will also act as an audio favour receiving hub for additional women and non-binary arts practitioners to record a favour and share it to the project.

Thursday 21 Dec 6 - 8pm
https://events.unimelb.edu.au/events/9750-favour-economy

------------

CATALOGUE

FavourEconomy:Stations durational catalogue will develop throughout the exhibition & Doing Feminisms / Sharing the World residency to document events as they occur.
Catalogue essay by Briony Downes.

FavourEconomy is occurring at a time when we have the greatest numbers of women working in the arts, yet women still do not have commensurate representation in leadership, exhibitions, publications and collections. While there are many systemic issues to be addressed there is one area that can be addressed by this project. We aim to support a culture where women help out other women in order to strengthen the female voice and power in the arts. We posit that our efforts can benefit others and that the more we support one another the easier it will be for women to impact upon the circuit of contemporary art production and dissemination.

For so many women the path to ‘success’ in the arts is hazardous. Subsequently the female voice often vanishes from public discourse before being heard. FavourEconomy investigates and presents the lived experiences of a diverse range of female and female identifying practitioners working in the arts today- creating value of a different kind. 

----------------
FavourEconomy is led by Claire Field, Alex Pedley and Bronwyn Treacy

data.description:
Venha participar do nosso último Encontro da Ocupação Soror de 2017 com a incrível Claudia Ferreira.
Claudia vem registrando os movimentos feministas desde 1980 até os dias atuais. Fotografias que além de documentar cada fase do movimento, também nos brinda com uma bela reflexão sobre as mudanças das pautas influenciadas pelas diferentes ondas do feminismo.
Venha conhecer esse lindo trabalho, participar conosco do debate e comemorar o encerramento de mais um ano!
Entrada gratuita.

CLAUDIA FERREIRA – Fotógrafa.  Trabalhou para os jornais Jornal do Brasil, Folha de São Paulo, Correio Brasiliense e para as agências Sipa Press e Cone Sur press. Desde o final da década de 80 vem documentando os movimentos sociais, principalmente os movimentos de mulheres.  Parte desse trabalho está reunido em seus livros “Marcha das Margaridas” – Ed. Aeroplano, 2015 e "Mulheres e Movimentos - Ed. Aeroplano, 2004. Sobre esse tema realizou dez exposições individuais nas cidades de Londres, Rio de Janeiro, Porto Alegre, Brasília, Salvador e João Pessoa e participou de várias coletivas nacionais e internacionais. É pesquisadora associada do Programa de Pós-doutorado em Estudos Culturais, do Programa Avançado de Cultura Contemporânea, da Universidade Federal do Rio de Janeiro; e do Laboratório de História Oral e Imagem, da Universidade Federal Fluminense. Atualmente coordena o Banco de Imagens www.memoriaemovimentossociais.com.br composto por fotos de sua autoria, que recebeu, em 2014, o prêmio Memórias Brasileiras, conferido pelo Instituto Brasileiro de Museus/Ministério da Cultura.
data.name: Feminismos com Claudia Ferreira

data.description:
How does the meaning of ‘feminism’ change in different contexts and times? And, what can we learn from historical feminist practices? “Feminism”, Yemisi Aribisala writes, “cannot be globally defined because Pangaea broke into pieces 250 million years ago and many wild waters and hazardous bush must be traversed to evangelise my kind of savage. The world is not one.” On the other hand, Science-fiction writer Octavia Butler describes it in terms of the act of writing yourself into the world: “You got to make your own worlds. You got to write yourself in it.” 

How do we – women, men, transgender, not-men – write ourselves into the world? And, how do we unwrite an already written page? How do we imagine a different language, another collective politics from the perspective of feminist practice today? When vulnerable communities continue to be threatened by racism, xenophobia, acts of bullyism, and violence against women, gay and trans-people, we feel the urge to address these and other questions in an attempt to mobilise and develop new feminist politics and practices. 
For this series of preliminary exercises, our point of departure is the acknowledgement of a deep, and we hope productive, disagreement on the meaning of and the contemporary valence of this term. Perhaps this is already what feminism is about, a form of collective non-alignment.

Through a series of performative events, talks and workshops, SPEAKING FEMINISMS enacts the multiple histories, struggles, and voices that define ‘feminism’ as both a practice and a concept.

Event held in English
The eight exercise withinthe series SPEAKING FEMINISM at SAVVY Contemporary is a collaboration of Ifa Galerie Berlin and SAVVY Contemporary.
data.name: Speaking Feminisms — 8th Exercise with Tracey Rose

data.description:
Dans le cadre du partenariat avec l’expo « Islam, c’est aussi notre histoire », Alohanews organise une série de conférences en lien avec l’islam. Pour la seconde rencontre, nous avons le plaisir de recevoir Malika Hamidi, Docteure en sociologie de l'École des Hautes Etudes en Sciences Sociales (EHESS), à Paris. Elle est également l'auteure de différents livres dont le dernier en date "Un féminisme musulman, et pourquoi pas ?". Durant la rencontre, il sera question de féminisme musulman et de la manière dont ce dernier se déploie dans notre société. 

Dans le monde musulman comme en Occident, les féministes dites « laïques » et « musulmanes » s'allient pour trouver des réponses aux problèmes liés au changement du statut des femmes : elles réclament une égalité entre les genres et s'engagent dans la vie politique, religieuse et culturelle pour faire évoluer les mentalités à partir d'un paradigme islamique. Malika Hamidi raconte ici les fondements théoriques et historiques de ce mouvement et sa mise en oeuvre actuelle, en s'appuyant tant sur des textes fondateurs que sur des exemples tirés de l'actualité. Son message est clair : la femme musulmane peut et doit s'engager dans le combat féministe. 

INFOS ET RESERVATIONS

Les places sont limitées. N’oubliez pas de réserver (Nom, Prénom, nombre de places) par mail : alohanews.be@gmail.com

P.A.F 5 euros / 3 euros (etudiants) 

Le livre de l’auteure sera disponible le jour de l’évènement.
data.name: Féminisme musulman : on en parle avec Malika Hamidi

data.description:
In cooperation with the Feminist Library Leipzig „ MONAliesA“ and Hilke Richter-Harder a new, exciting „Project Group Feminism“ will be initiated in Oktober in the ADI.

Starting at the 25th of Oktober 2017 at 7pm we will bi-weekly read and discuss articles on the topics of feminism, sexuality and female role models in a patriarchic society.

We want to open a group for wo*men who are interested in feminism but have not really found a means by which to become active yet. We plan six meetings, during which we will read texts together and exchange. In the course of this, we want to connect the theorie and our own experiences und use it to reexamine our everyday lives. So, if you want to read cutting edge feminist texts, form an oppinion about them, make contact, connect what you read to your own experiences and get to know thew adi and like-minded wo*men, you are just right! No prior knowledge rtequired.

Meetings will be held wednesdays oin the adi from 7pm to 8:30pm. For every meeting an excerpt of about twenty pages has to be read in advance. For participation, we ask for a binding registration for the whole project on h.richter-harder@posteo.de (max 10 people).

Reading circle language: English

To the same time there will be a reading group in German.

You will get the first text after enrollment.

First text: Roxane Gay - Bad Feminist
data.name: Reading circle feminism for newcomer in the theme

Die frauensommerakademie*2018 findet seit 2010 jährlich statt. 2018 findet die frauensommerakademie* vom 19. bis zum 22. Juli in NRW unter dem Titel "Feminismus bleibt Handarbeit" statt. Wenn der Zeitgeist spürbar nach rechts rückt, fällt uns wieder einmal mehr auf, dass Feminismus Kleinstarbeit ist. Wir wollen uns aber nicht damit abfinden, Abwehrkämpfe zu führen. Wir wollen uns auf dieser frauensommerakademie* gegenseitig ermutigen uns dem Zeitgeist entgegenzustellen.

Nähere Informationen zum Programm und genauen Ablauf werden laufend ergänzt.
Die Anmeldung ist bereits unter www.frauensommerakademie.de möglich.
Wir bedanken und ausdrücklich bei der Rosa-Luxemburg-Stiftung für die Förderung der fsa*

data.description:
-- LET OP: We zitten vol! Je kunt je nog steeds aanmelden, dan kom je op de wachtlijst terecht. Als iemand zich afmeldt of we toch een manier vinden om meer mensen te kunnen hosten ben je dan de eerste! --

Draagt je vriendin een T-shirt met de tekst ‘feminist’ erop, maar weet je eigenlijk niet zo goed of jij daar ook iets mee moet? Delen je vrienden feministische memes, lees je er steeds vaker krantenstukken over, en heb je het idee dat je iets mist? Klinkt feminisme best tof of juist een beetje eng, maar ben je wel benieuwd wat het nou eigenlijk is en wat jij eraan hebt? Kom naar de masterclass! Tijdens deze masterclass gaan we het gesprek aan over wat feminisme is, waarom het feminisme mannen nodig heeft én waarom mannen feminisme nodig hebben.

---
Deze masterclass is onderdeel van de White Ribbon Campagne.

#MeToo heeft voor eens en voor altijd duidelijk gemaakt hoe immens groot het probleem van (seksueel) geweld tegen vrouwen is, én hoe mannen kunnen kunnen bijdragen aan de oplossing. De harde realiteit is dat 45 procent van de volwassen vrouwen in Nederland sinds haar vijftiende te maken heeft gekregen met fysiek of seksueel geweld. Dit geweld wordt in negen van de tien gevallen door mannen gepleegd en wordt vaak ontkend, gebagatelliseerd of goedgepraat. 

Met de Nederlandse White Ribbon Campagne wil Emancipator mannen bewust maken dat geweld tegen vrouwen ook in hun omgeving voorkomt, en laten we zien wat zij kunnen doen om bij te dragen aan de oplossing. Wil je weten wat er nog meer gebeurt? Kijk op www.emancipator.nl/stopgeweldtegenvrouwen
data.name: Masterclass 'Feminisme voor mannen van feministische vrouwen'

Welche Konzepte verbergen sich hinter dem oft geschmähten Wort „Gender“? Woher stammt der Gedanke der geschlechtersensiblen Sprache? Warum sollte Frauen*rechsaktivismus intersektional sein und wie wird er das? 
In unserer Einführungsvorlesung im Rahmen des Studium generale der TU Dresden wollen wir wissenschaftliche Themengebiete der Geschlechterforschung und aktuelle Frauen*rechtsdebatten in ihren verschiedenen Facetten beleuchten und spannende Referent*innen von Grundlagen und/ oder ihrer eigenen Forschung sprechen lassen. data.description:
Borde alla vara feminister? Är en feministisk politik positivt för Sverige? Har Grön Ungdom eller Ungsvenskarna bäst jämställdhetspolitik? Hur uppnås jämställdhet? Vilka åtgärder och lagförslag krävs – och vilka krävs inte? Vad har debattörerna för syn på #MeToo?

Ungdomsperspektivet bjuder in Linnéa Vinge från Ungsvenskarna (SD) och Hanna Lidström från Grön Ungdom till en debatt om feminism och jämställdhet. Alla intresserade är välkomna!

VILKA?

Hanna Lidström, språkrör för feministiska Grön Ungdom debatterar mot Linnéa Vinge, jämställdhetspolitisk talesperson för ickefeministiska Ungsvenskarna (SDU).

VAD?

Grön Ungdom respektive Ungsvenskarnas syn på feminism 
och jämställdhetspolitik debatteras.

VAR?

Studiefrämjandet Stockholm, Norrtullsgatan 12 N. Ca 2 min gångavstånd från Odenplans T-bana. 

NÄR? 

Den 18:e december kl 18:00. Debatten arrangeras i samarbete med Studiefrämjandet.

OM OSS

Ungdomsperspektivet är en obunden ideell förening för unga med fokus på samhällsfrågor. Vår vision är att beröra, debattera och diskutera politiska ämnen med ett ungdomsperspektiv, att bredda ungdomars förståelse för politik och samhälle och erbjuda unga en plattform för yttrandefrihet och debatt över partigränserna. Gilla gärna vår Facebooksida för att stötta verksamheten och få information om kommande debatter!
data.name: Debatt: Feminism och jämställdhet – Ungsvenskarna vs Grön Ungdom

data.description:
Criaturas de la noche:  Cine, feminismos y disidencias sexuales.
Docente: Fermín Acosta
Martes 5/12 19 hs y Martes 12/12 19 hs.

¿Cuál es la historia del cine  contada desde los márgenes insumisos del feminismo y las disidencias sexuales? En este taller intensivo de dos encuentros trabajaremos con aproximaciones feministas y queer a una serie de materiales cinematográficos que normalmente fueron y son expulsados de las historias del cine con mayúscula.
Cine feminista de guerrilla, mutantes lesbianas, alienígenas bisexuales , brujas insurrectas, adolescentes asesinas, inadaptadxs y punks, putxs voyeuristas,  cine feminista de vanguardia, pornografía avant-garde, erotismo extravagante, directoras borradas de la historia del cine; todo esto irá desparrámandose por el universo audiovisual que intentaremos mapear y que reuniremos bajo una misma e insistente pregunta: aquella que reclama imaginar otros mundos posibles.


Sobre el docente:
Fermín Acosta es Investigador y docente egresado de la carrera de cine de la Universidad de Buenos Aires. Desde 2012 realiza trabajo de investigación y archivo en el equipo dirigido por Fernando Davis “Micropolíticas de la desobiencia sexual en el arte”.  Ha publicado y presentado artículos en congresos nacionales e internacionales vinculados al cruce entre imágenes, feminismos y disidencias sexuales.  Su trabajo como docente también articula problemas vinculados a la pornografía.Además ha mantenido una carrera como docente en la Cátedra Libre de Prácticas Artísticas y Políticas Sexuales (UNLP),  en el Programa de Actualización en Comunicación, Géneros y Sexualidades (FSOC-UBA) y en la UNA. Es profesor junto a María Eugenia Giorgi del Curso de Actualización Profesional "Una lectura feminista y queer de la cultura visual y audiovisual" (FADU-UBA) donde trabaja el cruce entre Diseño, Géneros y Sexualidades. Actualmente se encuentra finalizando sus estudios de maestría en Estudios Literarios Latinoamericanos (UNTREF). Como guionista y realizador, sus trabajos se presentaron en países como Chile, Uruguay, Colombia, Brasil, Cuba, Francia, Croacia y Bulgaria.  Su opera prima documental "Implantación", se estrenó en el Buenos Aires Festival Internacional de Cine Independiente de 2016.  Ha obtenido las becas Fondo Nacional de las Artes y Beca Fundación Oxenford.
data.name: Criaturas de la noche: Cine, feminismos y disidencias sexuales

SWMO NOW presents the kickoff event for our brand new series, "I Just Need Some Space," a series for millennial women and by millennial women. Join us in the Story Hour Room of The Library Center for Feminism 101, a safe space for high school and college women to discuss the history and definition of the word feminism. Maybe you aren't sure how you feel about feminism or maybe you have questions about what feminism even means. Do we all hate men and want to burn our bras? We'll answer all those questions and more.

Hear from facilitators Hannah Brashers and Grace Laflen how claiming the word feminist has helped them find their voices. Bring a gal pal, get ready to share your story, and eat some donuts!💪🏽💕🍩

P.S. While this event is specifically for millennial women, women of all ages are welcome to attend.
data.name: I Just Need Some Space: Feminism 101

data.description:
Half november verschijnt het boek 'Vuile lakens' van Anaïs Ertvelde en Heleen Debruyne en afgelopen april verscheen het boek 'Dolle mythes' van Linda Duits. Een perfect moment om eens met z'n allen te gaan zitten en te praten over het feminisme en seksualiteit van vandaag de dag. Zijn we echt zo vrijgevochten als we denken? Tegen welke (seksuele) norm of cliché loop jij aan in het dagelijks leven? Hoe willen we dat de toekomst eruit ziet? Kom op zaterdag 9 december luisteren en praten met de drie auteurs!

Over 'Dolle Mythes':
Zure manwijven in tuinbroeken: karikaturen van de Tweede Golf zijn hardnekkig, niet in de minste plaats onder de nieuwe generatie feministen die nu op aan het opstaan is. Zij zetten zich grootmoedig af tegen deze beelden, vaak ongehinderd door enige kennis. Genderstudies heeft echter niet stil gestaan sinds vrouwen zich baas in eigen buik verklaarden. In deze frisse factcheck van het feminisme ontkracht Linda Duits zeven mythes over feminisme. Ze analyseert wat er daadwerkelijk gebeurde in de Tweede Golf en spiegelt dat aan de praktijken van jonge feministen: van Dolle Mina tot Feministen Tegen Wilders, van praatgroepen tot hashtag-activisme. Met humor en veel voorbeelden ontsluit dit boek wetenschappelijke kennis voor iedereen met een mening over man/vrouw-verschillen.

Over 'Vuile Lakens':
Seks is overal. Op tv, op straat, op social media – er is geen ontkomen aan. Voortdurend flitsen verstrengelde lijven, suggestieve halfopen monden en seksspeeltjes voorbij. Wij westerlingen moeten dus wel bevrijd zijn, werkelijk vrij in wat we met onze lichamen doen.
Lang geloofden Anaïs Van Ertvelde en Heleen Debruyne dat ook, maar steeds vaker merkten ze dat hun verlangens toch botsten op bestaande normen. Normen die goed verborgen maar daarom des te hardnekkiger zijn.
In dit boek leggen Van Ertvelde en Debruyne bloot dat ‘seksuele vrijheid’ een illusie is. Ze zoeken in de geschiedenis, cultuur en wetenschap en in hun eigen ervaringen naar wat onze lichamen beknot, in de hoop zo de nodeloze schaamte eindelijk voorbij te raken.

Over Linda Duits:
Linda Duits is sociaalwetenschapper, gespecialiseerd in populaire cultuur. In april 2017 verscheen haar boek Dolle mythes. Een frisse factcheck van feminisme toen en nu. Ze is columnist voor studentenblad Folia en publiceert regelmatig in diverse media, waaronder NRC Handelsblad. Als expert op het gebied van jongeren en media is ze vaak te zien in de pers.

Over Anais van Ertvelde:
Anaïs van Ertvelde (1988) is historica aan de Universiteit van Leiden, waar ze onderzoek doet naar de geschiedenis van sociale bewegingen in relatie tot lichaam, handicap en gender. In november 2016 publiceert ze samen met Heleen Debruyne Vuile lakens. Een hedendaagse visie op seksualiteit Zij maken samen ook een podcast over seks en gender onder dezelfde naam.

Over Heleen Debruyne:
eleen Debruyne (1988) studeerde geschiedenis en journalistiek. Ze werkt bij Radio Klara en schrijft voor onder andere deBuren over kunst en cultuur. Daarnaast onderzoekt ze graag vleselijkheden in Vuile Lakens, een podcast over seks en lichaam die ze samen met Anaïs Van Ertvelde maakt. De plantrekkers is haar romandebuut en verscheen in het voorjaar van 2016.
In november 2017 verschijnt het boek Vuile lakens. Een hedendaagse visie op seksualiteit, waarin ze samen met Anaïs Van Ertvelde blootlegt dat 'seksuele vrijheid' een illusie is.
data.name: Vuile lakens & dolle mythes; over feminisme en seksualiteit

data.description:
Una palabra viene recorriendo las calles, las universidades, los buses, las oficinas, las fiestas: FEMINISMO.  

El movimiento de mujeres ha crecido exponencialmente y muchas deseamos construir espacios, no solo en las redes, sino también otros en los que podamos conversar sobre las dudas, cuestionamientos, preguntas y curiosidades que surgen cuando nos enfrentamos a esa palabra. 

¿Últimamente se han hecho las siguientes interrogantes?
¿Qué es realmente el feminismo? 
¿Todas las feministas debemos pensar igual?
¿Qué se necesita para ser feminista?
¿Cuál debería ser la relación entre los feminismos y ONG's?
¿Y con los Partidos Políticos?
¿Cómo deberían abordarse los casos de violencia denunciados entre las mismas feministas?

Nosotras también nos lo preguntamos y consideramos que las respuestas las deberíamos construir colectivamente sin mayor requisito que el querer conversar y debatir en el marco del respeto. 

Por ello, las invitamos este sábado 9 de diciembre a las 15:30 al I Encuentro: Feminismos desde cero, para construir desde nuestras experiencias y saberes el feminismo que queremos, desde la simple idea de que nadie tiene la verdad absoluta, menos en nuestra lucha.

Las esperamos en el Jr. San Martín Nº 3762 (a la altura de la cuadra 37 de la Av. Perú), donde se encuentra ubicado el cálido Centro Comunal de la 7ma. Zona. Es fácil de llegar, ¡vengan!

* Por cuestiones de autocuidado, almuerzo y gestión del espacio, les solicitamos que, por favor, llenen este Formulario: https://goo.gl/forms/g3tr8j8TopMLoaTb2

** Encuentro separatista: solo mujeres y personas LGTBIQ.
data.name: 1er Encuentro: Feminismos desde cero

data.description:
FEMINISM AND THE FRANKFURT SCHOOL
Instructor: Ajay Singh Chaudhary

Despite placing an explicit focus on regressive family structures, patriarchy, masculine domination of nature, and repressive sexuality, the first generation of Frankfurt School critical theorists was notoriously a boys’ club. While this certainly reflected historical norms at the time, it is particularly noteworthy as many of the original contributions of Frankfurt School thinkers seem to point at the gendered and sexual nature of domination in modern society. After all, the critique of patriarchy appears in the pages of Dialectic of Enlightenment as often as the critique of capital. While it is unquestionable that women contributed both directly and indirectly to the original Frankfurt School canon ( for example, the often unacknowledged influence of Gretel Adorno), the question of critical theory and feminism is provoked anew by the fact that many of the most salient, provocative, and influential thinkers to engage the Frankfurt School corpus in recent years are female scholars engaged with feminist work like Nancy Fraser, Seyla Benhabib, Susan Buck-Morss, and Angela Davis. What is the relationship between critical theory, gender, and feminism?

In this class, we will take up this question by reading works by the aforementioned authors and several others. While all of these thinkers are clearly influenced by other traditions as well, why have elements of Frankfurt School critical theory proved so powerful in their hands? How does the canons and concerns of feminism transform critical theory? And how does the legacy of the Frankfurt School look different through the lens of these thinkers?

To enroll, visit: https://thebrooklyninstitute.com/items/courses/feminism-frankfurt-school/.
data.name: Brooklyn Institute - Feminism and the Frankfurt School

14.12.17 - 18:00 - Cafeleven (Nassestraße 11)

BDSM und Feminismus werden sowohl in gesellschaftlichen, als auch feministischen Diskursen oft als Widerspruch betrachtet. Dominante Frauen: Gewaltausübende Männerhasserinnen oder Befriedigungsobjekte submissiver Männer? Sich unterordnende Frauen: Opfer, keine (starken) Feministinnen oder – wie Alice Schwarzer behauptet – gar Kollaborateurinnen des Patriarchats? Wer sich als BDSMler*in feministisch betätigt, wird häufig mit derartigen Aussagen konfrontiert. 

Doch was ist dran, an den bestehenden Bildern über (Frauen im) BDSM? Kann ein Ausleben der eigenen Neigungen als Ausdruck eines feministischen Selbstbewusstseins verstanden werden? Ist BDSM ein Spiel von Machtausübung und Unterdrückung, oder sind Autonomie und Freiheit der beteiligten Personen nur eine Illusion?

Gemeinsam mit drei jungen Frauen, die selbst im BDSM aktiv sind, wollen wir dieses Themenfeld aus unterschiedlichen feministischen Perspektiven beleuchten, eigene Erfahrungen schildern und mit potentiellen Vorurteilen brechen.
data.name: It works: Feminismus und BDSM

data.description:
Le mercredi 6 décembre, Comac Liège vous invite à la deuxième édition de la Nuit du Féminisme.

La vague de #MeToo et #BalanceTonPorc a envahi la toile depuis plusieurs semaines dévoilant la face cachée de l'iceberg des violences faites aux Femmes.

Les mesures d'austérité du gouvernement sont de plus en plus radicales et ont pour conséquence de précariser la population et en première ligne les Femmes.

Dans ce contexte, Comac Liège vous propose une soirée "Let's Drink and Talk" durant laquelle nous pourrons discuter ensemble de l'actualité et de l'évolution de la condition des Femmes, d'hier à aujourd'hui.
Expositions, intervenantes, discussions et d'autres surprises vous seront proposées. 🌼 

Nous espérons vous retrouver nombreuses et nombreux pour ce moment de partage! 😊 

Prix libre.

data.description:
BSA Presidential Event: Sociology and Feminism


Are we in an age of new masculinities and femininities? New feminisms? New gender troubles and everyday sexism?

Come and hear an introduction and an update on how sociology analyses gender (the way we are as men and women, how we do our masculinity and/or femininity) and gender inequality. Hear from academics and activists involved in feminism and sociology. Express your own experiences and views.

The event is for all - with or without prior knowledge - from school-pupil to retired academic.  Come and hear some brief contributions offering informed views on sociologists' and feminists' analysis of gender and gender inequality. Take the opportunity to question, challenge or tell your own stories.

The panel includes the sociologists:

Brian Heaphy - University of Manchester 
Rajan-Rankin - University of Kent
Karen Ingala-Smith - Counting Dead Women project, Co-founder of Femicide Census (with Women’s Aid) and CEO of  NIA

Event chaired by the BSA President, Lynn Jamieson.

The event is free to attend but registration is required.  Please note that the event will be filmed.

More details: https://www.britsoc.co.uk/events/key-bsa-events/sociology-and-feminism/

 Age limit to enter the event?

data.description:
Bu yıl üçüncüsü düzenlenen, Türkiye’nin en keyifli etkinliği olma özelliğine sahip Coffee Carnaval bu kez Eskişehir'de...

"Katılımcılarının hayatlarında mutlu bir an yaratmayı amaçlayan Karnaval bu güne kadar 17.000 kişiyi iyi kahve ve iyi müzikle buluşturmayı başardı.

9-10 Aralık 2017 tarihleri arasında Eskişehir’de gerçekleştirilecek festivalde; kaliteli kahvenin kokusu, Eskişehir’in enerjik dokusuyla birleşerek keyiflerden keyiflere sürükleyecek. Dünyanın farklı ülkelerinden gelen kahve çekirdeklerinin son tüketiciye ulaşma serüveni, Coffee Carnaval‘ın "İyi Kahveyi, İyi Müzikle, Doğru Yerde" buluşturma amacıyla, geleneksel hale gelen eğlenceli ve showlarla dolu ortamında gerçekleşecek.

Şehri, geleneksel Türk Kahvesi lezzet öncüleri ve üçüncü dalga nitelikli kahve akımının en iyi temsilcileri ile buluşturmaya devam edecek.

İyi müziği ruhunuzda hissederken, iki gün boyunca ücretsiz olarak sunulacak nitelikli Türk ve dünya kahveleri farklı aromalarla damak tadınızda şölen havası yaşatacak. En iyi Blues Grupları performansları ile kahve severlere eşlik ederken, triolar ve alt gruplar Karnaval alanına renk katmaya devam edecek.

Ücretsiz gerçekleştirilen seminerler ve workshop’larda; kahve çekirdeklerinden tutun da kahvenin demlenme macerasına kadar bir çok bilgiyi Şampiyon Baristalardan ve sektörün duayenlerinden bizzat öğrenme şansınız olacak. 

Karnaval; kahve üreticilerden, zincir dükkanlara, ev içi tüketime hatta hazırlama/sunum ekipmanlarına kadar tüm sektörü kahve tutkunları için bir araya getirecek.

Sadece iki gün sürecek olan, kahvenin vazgeçilmez parçası Coffee Carnaval’da yerinizi ayırtmayı unutmayın."

Bilete dahil hizmetler, Festivalde neler olacak?
• Ücretsiz ve sınırsız Türk Kahvesi, Dünya Kahveleri, 3. Dalga Kahveleri
• Ücretsiz Konser ve müzik dinletileri
• Şampiyon Baristalardan ve Kahve duayenlerinden Ücretsiz Atölye çalışmaları ve Seminerler
• Sanat köşeleri, sergi alanları

Herzlich Willkommen zur 4. Ausgabe des Vienna Coffee Festivals! ☕️

- Ausstellung
- Vorträge
- Workshops
- Verkostungen

…alles rund um den Kaffee!


Du trinkst gerne wirklich guten Kaffee oder suchst gar die perfekte Kaffeemaschine für dein Zuhause oder deinen Gastronomiebetrieb? Egal was du rund um das Thema Kaffee suchst, hier bist du definitiv richtig!

Komm‘ zum Vienna Coffee Festival 2018 in der Ottakringer Brauerei mit über 80 Ausstellern aus aller Welt. Erlebe vor Ort Verkostungen und Vorträge & Workshops, erlerne die authentische Zubereitung von Espresso und Filterkaffee, Spezialitätenkaffe oder entdecke Latte Art, Vending und vieles mehr für dich – Home-Baristas sowie Gastronomie sind hier genau richtig.

Als weitere Highlights wird euch am Wochenende die Österreichische Baristameisterschaften der SCA Austria geboten und für alle Partytiger unter euch, gibt es freitags die Welcome-Party und samstags die Hasta Barista – Party. Zu Guter Letzt, wenn vor lauter Koffein der Hunger kommt, kann man sich in unserem Food-Corner mit großer Vielfalt stärken. 

Vorbeischauen auf eine, oder gleich fünf Tassen Kaffee lohnt sich auf jeden Fall! 


☕️ Coffeetime ☕️
Freitag, 12.1. - 14:00 bis 20:00 Uhr 
Samstag, 13.1. – 10:00 bis 20:00 Uhr 
Sonntag, 14.1. – 10:00 bis 18:00 Uhr 

💃 Hasta Barista-Party 💃
Samstag, 13.1. – ab 20:00 Uhr
data.name: Vienna Coffee Festival 2018

data.description:
Autoglym Australia 
presents
Custom Cars and Coffee WA –DECEMBER END OF YEAR MEGA MEET

THIS ONE WILL BE HUGE!!!!

SATURDAY DECEMBER 16th – PERTH MOTORPLEX

*********LATE Arvo Time Slot**********
5 Hr Meet 2.00pm-7.00pm 
Drag Racing starts 3pm

We are super excited to work with the Perth Motorplex crew and offer Cars and Coffee entrants at our December meet to chance to put your machine to test and run it down the quarter mile. 
So grab the family for Late Arvo cruise to the Perth Motorplex- Kwinana to join vehicles from all era’s. Come and check out Perth's most beautiful Muscle Cars, Vintage, Classics, Street Machines, Hotrods, Exotics , Euro, Jap and Bikes for a end of year meet that will include Drag Racing, Music and Food.

We are seeking vendors for stalls/displays, contact me on customcarsandcoffeewa@gmail.com

$10 per Car
$10walk in Spectators/ Bikes/ Family unit- Kids Free                                                           $30 to go Drag Racing

CC&C is arguably WA's most unique high octane coffee get together, for now at a new High-Octane hangout, the Perth Motorplex. Bring a chair or a blanket and sit down with Friends and Family and have a lazy Saturday Arvo checking out Perth’s sweetest Street Machines, Hotrods and Bikes. 

Drag Racing will be open to any Car or Bike that meets the minimum criteria the same as Wednesday night street drags.
The track will be fully prepped and the timing will be operational.

This is the chance to settle those scores with your mates or satisfy that urge you may have always had to give drag racing a go. You will get multiple runs throughout the afternoon.

We will have more details out in the next week, however we will be having a normal 5hr Cars and Coffee meet, with music, food vans, sponsor/vendor displays, and a few things for the kids to do, as well as 4 hrs of drag racing to watch or you if you like have a go for yourself.

We have tried to keep the cost down as low as possible, I think we have come up with a fair price to encourage the whole family to come down and enjoy 5 hrs of automotive candy. Cost will be $10 for all cars/bikes as usual to enter into Cars and Coffee, Spectators will be $10 each, Kids free. Drag racing will be an extra $30 per Car/Driver/Bike.

We are set to have an awesome meet.

Minimum requirements for drag racing will be confirmed this week but are:
Cars;
-Pass safety check (Brakes/Steering/Neutral safety switch operational/Tyres in good Cond etc.)
-Min 3-point lap seat belt 
-Radiator overflow
- No loose items in car
Driver:
- Long Sleeves/pants/socks/enclosed shoes
- Helmet showing the AS/NZS 1698 standard
Bike riders: 
- Full face Helmet showing the AS/NZS 1698 standard
- Riding attire Jacket/long pants including boots that cover the ankle(no sneakers)


Extra Catering vans brought in for this meet so there will be plenty of food, drinks and hot coffee for you to enjoy. We will have some jumpy castles for the kids and a DJ pumping music

If you have friends that hang around in the Vintage, Veteran, Classic, Hotrod, Exotic car or bike scene, encourage them to come for a run. It’s all about the cars!!

Vehicles open to Vintage/Classics cars and bikes, Kustoms, Street Machines, Muscle cars, Lowriders, JDM, Hot Rods and Exotics. Come down for an informal chat about all things Cars/Bikes over a Coffee
We don't care wether its modified, stock, lowered, lifted or vehicles from any age. 
Cars & Coffee Perth are High Octane Coffee Meets are run by Enthusiasts for Enthusiasts keeping the car culture alive

NO Burnouts, chirpies or enthusiastic acceleration in and around the venue!!!
Police will be in attendance

Tools and antisocial behaviour will not be tolerated!!
Please drive responsibly...Your passion; lifestyle and hobby are on show.

Look forward to seeing you at the Plex

Jason and Eleissa

Photo Credit Ashleigh Peake
www.facebook.com/pg/creativefleirephotography
data.name: Cars and Coffee Perth-December End of Year Mega Meet

data.description:
Laadukasta kahvia juhlistetaan neljättä kertaa Pohjois-Euroopan suurimmilla kahvifestivaaleilla Helsingin Kaapelitehtaalla 20.-22.4.2018.
(INFO IN ENGLISH BELOW)

Kevään kuumimmassa tapahtumassa maistellaan laadukkaita kahveja eri puolilta maailmaa yhdellä lipulla.

Tapahtumassa valitaan vuoden kahvi (suodatin ja espresso) sekä yleisö äänestää Suomen parhaan paahtimon ja kahvilan.

Vuoden 2018 festareilla puhutaan erityisesti siitä, miten kahvin kasvualue vaikuttaa makuun ja miten eri maiden kahvilajikkeet eroavat toisistaan. Missä olosuhteissa kahvimarja kasvaa ja mitkä asiat vaikuttavat makuun?

Uutuutena festareilla lanseerataan myös makuparibrunssi!

Tapahtumassa oppii kaiken kahvista, muun muassa valmistamaan kahvia erilaisilla menetelmillä, tunnistamaan makuvivahteita ja makupareja sekä huoltamaan ja puhdistamaan laitteita. Lisäksi voit seurata, kuinka raakapapuja paahdetaan.

Kokopäivälippujen lisäksi tapahtumaan myydään viime kerrasta tuttuja sessiolippuja (aamupäivä- ja iltapäivälippuja) lauantaille ja sunnuntaille.

Festivaaleilla saa vinkkejä kahvihetkien parantamiseen baristoilta ja muilta ammattilaisilta. Festivaalitunnelmaa luovat myös DJ:t, kahvidrinkit, herkut ja esiintyjät.

Pssst. Tapahtumassa myös salateehuone...

Nettisivut: www.helsinkicoffeefestival.com

The biggest coffee festival in the Nordics, Helsinki Coffee Festival is here to stay!

Join the coffee revolution in Finland and learn everything about coffee on 20-22.4.2018 at the Cable Factory, Helsinki.

At the festival it's possible to test different coffees and coffee equipment as well as learn from the baristas at the stands and coffee labs how to make quality coffee at home. Other programme include panel discussions, as well as coffee brunch!

The filter coffee and espresso of the year will be chosen at the festival as well as the best coffee shop and roastery in Finland, which is voted by the audience.

The festival atmosphere is created by the hottest DJs, tasty coffee drinks, delicacies and other interesting programme.

Website: www.helsinkicoffeefestival.com
data.name: Helsinki Coffee Festival 2018

Hyvät Kolon ja taiteen ystävät! 

On aika jälleen juoda kahvia ja piirtää kysytyssä ja tykätyssä elävän mallin piirtämisen Drink & Draw-illassa! 

Tapahtumassa piirretään elävää mallia, ja hyvä kahvi, kynän liikkeet paperilla sekä virtaava soittolista tekevät kokemuksesta meditatiivisen. Jokainen piirustus on uniikki ja lähestymistapa vapaamuotoinen.

Aikaisempaa kokemusta et tarvitse, ja paikan päältä voi lainata piirustusvälineitä. Ilta kestää muutaman tunnin jolloin voit pysähtyä kahvin ja paperin äärelle sinulle sopivan hetken verran. 

Tapahtuma on ilmainen, ja voit varata pientä rahaa mukaan kolehtiin jolla kiitetään mallia.

Pian nähdään Pengerkadulla! Tule, ja anna Kolon pitää sinusta huolta.

Terveisin,

Drink&Draw emännät Salla ja Fredrika

data.description:
The Coffee Show

Είσαι γνώστης του καφέ, αλλά θες να διευρύνεις τους ορίζοντές σου σε ό,τι αφορά στον ευαίσθητο αυτό καρπό και την ανάδειξη των χαρακτηριστικών του; Σ’ αρέσει στην παραδοσιακή μορφή του μορφή, αλλά θες να ανακαλύψεις κι εκείνη που προκύπτει, όταν παντρεύεται με την μοντέρνα;

To Coffee Show που θα διεξαχθεί την άνοιξη του 2018 17 & 18 Απριλίου στο Athinais Cultural Center, Καστοριάς 34-36, Βοτανικός, Αθήνα. 

Καταξιωμένες εταιρείες με μακροχρόνια και εξελικτική πορεία σε ό,τι αφορά στην τέχνη του καφέ, αλλά και φιλόδοξες startup, με φρέσκια οπτική και καινοτόμες προσεγγίσεις, θα παρουσιάσουν νέα προϊόντα και trends.

Η έκθεση αυτή baristi και επαγγελματιών του κλάδου έχει στόχο την εκπαίδευση, την ενημέρωση γύρω από τις νέες τεχνικές παρασκευής και σερβιρίσματος του καφέ, την κατάρτιση των ανθρώπων του κλάδου, με απώτερο σκοπό και την ανάπτυξη του ίδιου, την παρουσίαση καινοτόμων εργαλείων κι εξοπλισμού, αλλά και την γνωριμία με τα προϊόντα μέσα από διαδικασίες γευσιγνωσίας. 

Μέσα από τα σεμινάρια και τις παρουσιάσεις, που θα πραγματοποιούνται καθ’ όλη τη διάρκεια του διημέρου, από τους καλύτερους Έλληνες και διεθνείς γνώστες του είδους, ο επισκέπτης θα έρθει επίσης σε επαφή με επιτυχημένα και καινοτόμα business models.

Η έκθεση απευθύνεται μόνο σε επαγγελματίες.
Ωράριο λειτουργίας: 10.00 – 19.00


Διοργάνωση:
Bar Academy Hellas
Κατσώνη Λάμπρου 36, Αθήνα, TK 11471
Τηλ. 210 640 0540
www.baracademy.gr

data.description:
After his mind-blowingly successful residency at Hï Ibiza, multi-award-winning DJ and producer, Black Coffee, returns to Shimmy Beach Club this December for a second season, with 5 exclusive Friday night shows. With his latest gold rated EP aptly named “The Journey Continues”, Shimmy Beach Club is thrilled to continue their journey with the now world-renowned homegrown superstar and welcome him back to the iconic Shimmy stage.

Black Coffee’s residency will form part of Shimmy Beach Club’s annual Summer Calling campaign and is indeed a highlight on the calendar, with last year’s shows all sold out weeks in advance. The premier party venue balances the style of international party life and the laid-back atmosphere of Cape Town, making it a stylish venue to rival Ibiza’s beach club scenes. This year Black Coffee will be joined by a fresh line-up of local DJs on the decks, including Da Capo and Enoo Napo, contributing to what promises to be a big night out. 

Black Coffee will be playing at Shimmy Beach Club on Friday 8th, 15th, 22nd, 29th December 2017 and Friday 5th January 2018.  Don’t miss this opportunity, tickets are on sale now. 
Tickets are available via shimmy.nutickets.co.za 

Early Bird General Access: R195 pp
General Access: R250 pp
Early Bird VIP: R295 pp
VIP: R350 pp (includes access to a private bar with limited seating)

To book VIP table bookings email tickets@shimmybeachclub.co.za or call 021 200 7778. The closest parking lot to Shimmy Beach Club is The Clock Tower parking, V&A Waterfront, with Shimmy shuttles running frequently between the venue and the parking. It is however recommended that partygoers make use of a reliable taxi service.
data.name: Shimmy Beach Club presents Black Coffee 15 Dec 2017

This year Black Coffee will be joined by a fresh line-up of local DJs on the decks, including Da Capo and Enoo Napo, contributing to what promises to be a big night out. 

Black Coffee will be playing at Shimmy Beach Club on Friday 8th, 15th, 22nd, 29th December 2017 and Friday 5th January 2018.  Don’t miss this opportunity, tickets are on sale now.

VIP: R350 pp (includes access to a private bar with limited seating)

The closest parking lot to Shimmy Beach Club is The Clock Tower parking, V&A Waterfront, with Shimmy shuttles running frequently between the venue and the parking. It is however recommended that partygoers make use of a reliable taxi service.

data.description:
Official announcement: Fashion talk #facetofaceseries12, Fashion Marketing from offline to online: How brands stand out? - Để thương hiệu trỗi dậy!

Khách mời: Marketing Director Trần Hà Mi

Bạn thân mến. Vào tháng 4/2017, ở Fashion Talk số 4, cuộc trò chuyện có chủ đề: Fashion Marketing Chiến lược và cảm hứng? cùng chị Trần Hà Mi đã để lại nhiều ấn tượng và bài học quan trọng. Rất nhiều bạn bày tỏ niềm mong muốn có thêm một cuộc trò chuyện nữa, vì bức tranh marketing thời trang thực sự rộng lớn và người trẻ không biết phải xoay xở thế nào trên "đường băng ấy".

Giờ đây, chúng tôi mời chị trở lại lần nữa, với một chủ đề thuộc về Fashion Marketing 4.0.

Trong kỷ nguyên số, nơi Pinterest như Look book kiểu mới; Google, Youtube là những thư viện thời trang mở (Google vừa ra mắt dự án We wear culture); Instagram ghi dấu văn hoá đại chúng; Facebook & Facebook live! trở thành kênh truyền thông quan trọng; Amazon, Net-A-Porter chào mừng bạn đến thế giới thời trang mới, chỉ qua một cú click chuột...

Những sàn diễn luôn không bao giờ chết. Tuy nhiên, luật chơi mới là gì? Làm thế nào Để thương hiệu trỗi dậy?

F.A.C.E Fashion Workshop thân mời bạn tham dự Fashion talk #facetofaceseries12: Fashion Marketing from offline to online: How brands stand

Thông tin về Ms Trần Hà Mi:
Chị Trần Hà Mi có bằng Thạc sĩ về Quản trị kinh doanh và Marketing thời trang tại ESMOD International ở Paris, từng làm việc tại Circus&Ci ở kinh đô thời trang này và làm việc ba tháng tại tạp chí Vogue Mỹ.
Cô trở về Việt Nam làm phụ trách Marketing cho Gucci Việt Nam một thời gian ngắn trước khi chuyển đến Ringier Việt Nam ở vị trí giám đốc Marketing Elle Việt Nam từ năm 2011 đến 2014. Trước khi chuyển đến vị trí Head of Marketing at Leflair, a premium flash-sale e-commerce website.
Chị Hà Mi là người sáng lập #hashtag #unghontkviet với sự tham gia của rất nhiều người có ảnh hưởng trong ngành công nghiệp thời trang nội địa.

Save the date:
F.A.C.E pop-up cafe & Open Day Saigon:
Thời gian: 10g00, 26/11/2017, 
Địa điểm: Dinosys cafe, 204 Pasteur, Q.3
Form đăng kí: https://goo.gl/forms/I5p71qKYDkssSpPp2

F.A.C.E pop-up cafe & Open Day Hanoi:
Thời gian: 10g00, 10/12/2017, 
Địa điểm: Toong co-working space, 8 Tràng Thi, Q. Hoàn Kiếm
Form đăng kí: https://goo.gl/forms/whxr6N6kJrUroVjl1

* Dịp này, workshop giảng dạy về Fashion marketing cũng được diễn ra tại F.A.C.E Fashion Workshop trong 2 ngày, 9-10/12/2017. Liên hệ Hotline để biết thêm thông tin.
data.name: Fashion Marketing Từ offline đến online: Để thương hiệu trỗi dậy

data.description: Join HistoryMiami Museum and explore one of Miami’s trendiest and most dynamic neighborhoods – the Wynwood Art District. Learn how this textile warehouse and immigrant neighborhood, formerly known as “Little San Juan,” is quickly becoming the world’s largest outdoor art gallery. Stroll past vast murals and various street art displays, as you listen to the history of graffiti from the advent of written language to today. Hear stories of the artists, residents, and developers who made Wynwood home to over seventy galleries, five museums, and seven art complexes.
data.name: Wynwood: A History of Street Art

Tickets are going fast! Get yours today!

https://www.eventbrite.com/o/lakeshore-family-resources-and-casa-court-appointed-special-advocates-7416809771


About:

Join us for a holiday event of fun, laughs and creativity. We begin with our jolly conductors aboard our own magical trolleys that start at Manitowoc Coffee for a joy ride to the Holiday Inn (North Pole) that includes a quick visit with a special guest, complete with carols and holiday cheer. At the North Pole, there will be a holiday party complete with craft activities, refreshments, entertainment, story telling at more. The most exciting part of all, Santa has made time in his busy schedule to be there for the party and will be available for photos.

Tickets Include:

* 20 minute Magical Trolley Ride
* Visit and Professional 5x7 Photo with Santa
* Cookie Decorating and Hot Chocolate
* Crafts and Games
*Face Painting
* Hatrack Story Telling Performances
*Special Bell to Remind you of the Spirit of the Holidays
* Children’s tickets include choice of a Hardcover Holiday themed book to be chosen at time of ticket purchase

Child tickets (Ages 1-13): $20
Adult tickets: $25

**Children under 1 year of age can experience the event for free with the purchase of an adult ticket. You can purchase a $15 ticket for a child under 1 if you would like for them to have a book of their own.
The Hoilday Inn in Manitowoc is offering a reduced hotel rate for Friday and/or Saturday night for $69/night. You must show your event ticket to receive the reduced rate.

You CAN purchase tickets WITHOUT having a PayPal account. When it asks for payment information, click on the pictures of the credit cards or PayPal logo. This will take you to another screen that asks you to log in to PayPal. If you look just below the PayPal information there is a grey button that says 'pay with credit/debit card'.

We encourage everyone, adults included, to come to the event in their pajamas. We are also encouraging the spirit of giving by asking families to gift a new pair of pajamas to be given to a child in need.
**Please note, this is a fundraiser for Court Appointed Special Advocates (CASA) and Lakeshore Family Resources, programs of Lakeshore CAP. All proceeds will go to benefit vulnerable children in our service area. Tickets will not be refunded in the case of inclement weather and the event will not be rescheduled. Additionally, no ticket refunds will be offered for any reason. If you are unable to attend you may give or sell your tickets to another party. By purchasing tickets you agree to these conditions.

Join us for a magical trolley ride to the North Pole!  Ticket price includes:

*Round trip ride on a magical (heated) trolley from Manitowoc 
 Coffee to the North Pole.
*5x7 professional photo with Santa
*Crafts
*Cookie decorating and hot chocolate
*Performances by the Hatrack Storytellers
*Games and more!
*Children's tickets include a special gift to be selected at time of ticket purchase

Adult tickets $25  Child tickets (ages 1-14) $20

data.description:
Free with RSVP: 

PART I

Building on foundational works of Fanon, Cesaire, Memmi, Wynter, and others, this participatory and deeply imaginative workshop explores how the practices of racism manifest through institutions and organizations, impacting the psychic wholeness of program participants. 

In recent decades, much research has been conducted on stress, physiological symptoms and their relationship to institutional (organizational) and systemic racism; heart disease, maternal stress, depression, etc. Orchestrated through policy, imagery, narrative, history, culture, it is this sleight of hand and its impact on the soul that will be explored collectively.

This program is led by Amber McZeal, M.A. who’s organization 'Decolonizing the Psyche' focuses on the role of sacred scholarship and liberation arts practices in social and cultural transformation.
__________

PART II

Effective methods of treatment and research for mental illness and mood disorders, as they relate to the black community, are lacking. Historical and social variables are generally overlooked, with the impact of colonialism, the slave trade, and institutional racism seldom making the conversation. 

To believe that all depression and/or mental illness, and/or grief is created equal, to assume that predominately European models and methods can provide non-Europeans with proper diagnosis, treatment, or healing insults the depth of our history, risks ignoring the origin of our mental illness, undermines the aptitude of our sovereign state, ultimately leaving us more broken.

To achieve psychic wholeness, we must acknowledge and confront the harm committed by contemporary institutions of 'healing.’ Led by a consortium of wellness workers, this program is a space and time for healers and the healing to collectively navigate the origin, reality, and dismantling of an unspoken legacy. 

This program is led by Kalkidan Gebreyohannes who has her degree in psychology and has worked closely with young girls dealing with mental illness, drug addiction, behavioral issues and victims of sexual abuse. After moving away from this career with many life changes in between she has decided to make the collective healing of our community as it relates to mental health a priority, through truthful conversations, vulnerability, community building, nutrition and health.

*In the spirit of decoloniality, these programs are participatory, dialogical, nonhierarchical, and radically conversational.
__________
'Fanon: Decolonizing the Psyche: From Theory to Practice' is presented by MATATU within a body of workshops that navigate self-determination, wellness, sovereignty, and roadmaps to the future. The workshops are free to the public and funded by Akonadi Foundation's Beloved Community Fund.

MATATU is a platform for conversation, experience, and expression that helps ordinary people share their journeys. Together, we hope to enhance empathy and understanding of the global human condition. 

We are a fiscally sponsored project of Intersection for the Arts. Learn more about us at www.matatu.co
data.name: Fanon: Decolonizing the Psyche - From Theory to Practice

The Museum of Contemporary Art Australia are teaming up with Young Henrys for a special summer series of free live music and flowing local beer, held on the first Wednesday of every month. 

Catch the second installment of the series with a rooftop performance from Romisounds. Influenced by Shakey Graves, Bon Iver and Matt Corby, Romi's alluring combination of folk, indie and heartfelt acoustic draws crowds that cover the streets.

Where passionate coffee and tea professionals will learn skills, receive education and experience new products, alongside great networking.

Coffee Fest Trade Shows, Education, and Competitions have been at the forefront of the Coffee, Tea, and Specialty Beverage Industry since 1992.

Viewed by most as one of the best trade shows produced both nationally and internationally, Coffee Fest is specifically provided for those involved with retailing coffee, tea, and related products. Coffee Fest continues to evolve and stay at the forefront of emerging trends. To date, more than 350,000 have attended and benefited from their time at Coffee Fest.

If it looks like coffee, smells like coffee, goes well with coffee or is coffee, you will find it at Coffee Fest. Everything under the sun that would be found in an upscale coffee shop, on either side of the counter (including the counter) is found on the exhibition floor at Coffee Fest. The industry leading retail education, training, and workshops are also hosted at our Coffee Fest events!


Registration Info:

Early Bird Registration Deadline:  Register before February 25th, 2018 for a General Admission price of only $30. After this date, General Admission is $60.

CoffeeCon is the world's first 100% consumer coffee festival featuring tasting floor, top coffee experts, tasting seminars, coffee classes and labs in every brewing method.

All tickets include access to the exhibit floor as well as free classes and demos on the day of your ticket (excluding The Special Coffee Tasting Seminar which is limited to 100 seats).

The Show Days/Times:

Saturday, February 3th, 9-4 (Classes 10-3)

Sunday, February 4th, 9-4 (Classes 10-3)

FAQs

 Age limit to enter the event?

Nope and we are family friendly. Children under 12 may enter for free with an adult. 

Where can I contact the organiser with any questions?

patricia@coffee-con.com

Is my registration/ticket transferrable?

Yes you may purchase tickets for others and give as gifts. 

Can I update my registration information?

Yes on your Eventbrite account. 

Do I have to bring my printed ticket to the event?

You may or bring your electronic ticket on your device.

What is the refund policy?

100% refund up to 7 days before the event. 

The name on the registration/ticket doesn't match the attendee. Is that okay?

Yes. 

Parking/Public Transportation

Parking at the venue is $20 however there are other parking lots nearby and can be found on Parkopedia. Just enter the address, 1933 S. Broadway. For example, Unified Parking Service, Inc. at 1620 S Flower St. is a 10minute walk and parking is $4 for the day. There is also plenty of street parking. The Metro Blue Line is 2 blocks away.

data.description:
Bu yıl üçüncüsü düzenlenen, Türkiye’nin en keyifli etkinliği olma özelliğine sahip Coffee Carnaval bu kez Eskişehir'de...

"Katılımcılarının hayatlarında mutlu bir an yaratmayı amaçlayan Karnaval bu güne kadar 17.000 kişiyi iyi kahve ve iyi müzikle buluşturmayı başardı.

9-10 Aralık 2017 tarihleri arasında Eskişehir’de gerçekleştirilecek festivalde; kaliteli kahvenin kokusu, Eskişehir’in enerjik dokusuyla birleşerek keyiflerden keyiflere sürükleyecek. Dünyanın farklı ülkelerinden gelen kahve çekirdeklerinin son tüketiciye ulaşma serüveni, Coffee Carnaval‘ın "İyi Kahveyi, İyi Müzikle, Doğru Yerde" buluşturma amacıyla, geleneksel hale gelen eğlenceli ve showlarla dolu ortamında gerçekleşecek.

Şehri, geleneksel Türk Kahvesi lezzet öncüleri ve üçüncü dalga nitelikli kahve akımının en iyi temsilcileri ile buluşturmaya devam edecek.

İyi müziği ruhunuzda hissederken, iki gün boyunca ücretsiz olarak sunulacak nitelikli Türk ve dünya kahveleri farklı aromalarla damak tadınızda şölen havası yaşatacak. En iyi Blues Grupları performansları ile kahve severlere eşlik ederken, triolar ve alt gruplar Karnaval alanına renk katmaya devam edecek.

Ücretsiz gerçekleştirilen seminerler ve workshop’larda; kahve çekirdeklerinden tutun da kahvenin demlenme macerasına kadar bir çok bilgiyi Şampiyon Baristalardan ve sektörün duayenlerinden bizzat öğrenme şansınız olacak. 

Karnaval; kahve üreticilerden, zincir dükkanlara, ev içi tüketime hatta hazırlama/sunum ekipmanlarına kadar tüm sektörü kahve tutkunları için bir araya getirecek.

Sadece iki gün sürecek olan, kahvenin vazgeçilmez parçası Coffee Carnaval’da yerinizi ayırtmayı unutmayın."

Bilete dahil hizmetler, Festivalde neler olacak?
• Ücretsiz ve sınırsız Türk Kahvesi, Dünya Kahveleri, 3. Dalga Kahveleri
• Ücretsiz Konser ve müzik dinletileri
• Şampiyon Baristalardan ve Kahve duayenlerinden Ücretsiz Atölye çalışmaları ve Seminerler
• Sanat köşeleri, sergi alanları

data.description:
EL EVENTO MÁS ESPERADO POR LOS AMANTES DEL CAFÉ Y EL CHOCOLATE

COFFEE & CHOCOLATE EXPO - PUERTO RICO 2017
Ven con toda tu familia a degustar lo mejor de la industria en la exhibición más grande de café y chocolate en el Caribe. El 28 y 29 de octubre de 11:00 am a 6:00 pm, en el Centro de Convenciones de Puerto Rico. 

Disfruta de sobre 160 exhibidores, en los cuales tendrás la oportunidad de realizar degustaciones de cafés, chocolates, té, entre otros productos complementarios. Además, exhibiciones de baristas, bartenders, el Chef Showcase dónde reconocidos chefs prepararán diferentes platos integrando el café y chocolate en sus recetas, el Coffee & Chocolate Academy con talleres y conferencias, artesanías, pabellón de entretenimiento para niños y muchas sorpresas

Además, los asistentes al Evento tendrán la oportunidad participar como jueces y votar para seleccionar el mejor café y chocolate dentro de las marcas participantes “The Best Coffee & The Best Chocolate – People’s Choice Award”, como también, podrán ser jurado de la deliciosa competencia de esculturas de chocolate “Chocolate Challenge” para seleccionar su obra favorita.

Boletos VIP PreVenta Especial* $17.00 + IVU (Reg. $35.00) >>> http://bit.ly/2u1IYbb

Boletos Generales $8.00 + IVU  >>> http://bit.ly/2u1wtwi
- Menores de 12 años entran libre de costo.

**Coffee & Chocolate Academy**
Si quieres aprender aún más sobre la industria de café y chocolate, mira los cursos y talleres que tenemos disponibles como parte del Coffee & Chocolate Academy:
*Todos los cursos y talleres incluyen la entrada al evento, sin costo adicional.

Curso: ¿Cómo establecer un “Coffee Shop” ? + Panel de la industria
Más info >>> www.coffeeandchocolateexpo.com

Para preguntas sobre exhibidores, auspicios, cursos o información general: 787-568-7646 | hello@cubegroupevents.com | www.coffeeandchocolateexpo.com

Para boletos: www.coffeeandchocolateexpo.com | www.prtickets.com

**Chef Showcase**
En la tarima principal del Evento contaremos con una diversidad de chef locales, baristas y bartenders creando recetas utilizando como base el café y el chocolate.

**Kids Pavilion**
Área exclusiva para niños de todas las edades en donde encontrarán un sin número de atracciones para su entretenimiento.

**Campeonato Nacional de Baristas de Puerto Rico**
En esta competencia se selecciona al Barista que representará a Puerto Rico en el World Barista Championship y el World Latte Art Championship.

Para preguntas o información adicional se puede comunicar al Tel.: 787-568-7646 | hello@cubegroupevents.com

Herzlich Willkommen zur 4. Ausgabe des Vienna Coffee Festivals! ☕️

- Ausstellung
- Vorträge
- Workshops
- Verkostungen

…alles rund um den Kaffee!


Du trinkst gerne wirklich guten Kaffee oder suchst gar die perfekte Kaffeemaschine für dein Zuhause oder deinen Gastronomiebetrieb? Egal was du rund um das Thema Kaffee suchst, hier bist du definitiv richtig!

Komm‘ zum Vienna Coffee Festival 2018 in der Ottakringer Brauerei mit über 80 Ausstellern aus aller Welt. Erlebe vor Ort Verkostungen und Vorträge & Workshops, erlerne die authentische Zubereitung von Espresso und Filterkaffee, Spezialitätenkaffe oder entdecke Latte Art, Vending und vieles mehr für dich – Home-Baristas sowie Gastronomie sind hier genau richtig.

Als weitere Highlights wird euch am Wochenende die Österreichische Baristameisterschaften der SCA Austria geboten und für alle Partytiger unter euch, gibt es freitags die Welcome-Party und samstags die Hasta Barista – Party. Zu Guter Letzt, wenn vor lauter Koffein der Hunger kommt, kann man sich in unserem Food-Corner mit großer Vielfalt stärken. 

Vorbeischauen auf eine, oder gleich fünf Tassen Kaffee lohnt sich auf jeden Fall!

Sonntag, 14.1. – 10:00 bis 18:00 Uhr

data.description:
Autoglym Australia 
presents
Custom Cars and Coffee WA –DECEMBER END OF YEAR MEGA MEET

THIS ONE WILL BE HUGE!!!!

SATURDAY DECEMBER 16th – PERTH MOTORPLEX

*********LATE Arvo Time Slot**********
5 Hr Meet 2.00pm-7.00pm 
Drag Racing starts 3pm

We are super excited to work with the Perth Motorplex crew and offer Cars and Coffee entrants at our December meet to chance to put your machine to test and run it down the quarter mile. 
So grab the family for Late Arvo cruise to the Perth Motorplex- Kwinana to join vehicles from all era’s. Come and check out Perth's most beautiful Muscle Cars, Vintage, Classics, Street Machines, Hotrods, Exotics , Euro, Jap and Bikes for a end of year meet that will include Drag Racing, Music and Food.

We are seeking vendors for stalls/displays, contact me on customcarsandcoffeewa@gmail.com

$10 per Car
$10walk in Spectators/ Bikes/ Family unit- Kids Free                                                           $30 to go Drag Racing

CC&C is arguably WA's most unique high octane coffee get together, for now at a new High-Octane hangout, the Perth Motorplex. Bring a chair or a blanket and sit down with Friends and Family and have a lazy Saturday Arvo checking out Perth’s sweetest Street Machines, Hotrods and Bikes. 

Drag Racing will be open to any Car or Bike that meets the minimum criteria the same as Wednesday night street drags.
The track will be fully prepped and the timing will be operational.

This is the chance to settle those scores with your mates or satisfy that urge you may have always had to give drag racing a go. You will get multiple runs throughout the afternoon.

We will have more details out in the next week, however we will be having a normal 5hr Cars and Coffee meet, with music, food vans, sponsor/vendor displays, and a few things for the kids to do, as well as 4 hrs of drag racing to watch or you if you like have a go for yourself.

We have tried to keep the cost down as low as possible, I think we have come up with a fair price to encourage the whole family to come down and enjoy 5 hrs of automotive candy. Cost will be $10 for all cars/bikes as usual to enter into Cars and Coffee, Spectators will be $10 each, Kids free. Drag racing will be an extra $30 per Car/Driver/Bike.

We are set to have an awesome meet.

Minimum requirements for drag racing will be confirmed this week but are:
Cars;
-Pass safety check (Brakes/Steering/Neutral safety switch operational/Tyres in good Cond etc.)
-Min 3-point lap seat belt 
-Radiator overflow
- No loose items in car
Driver:
- Long Sleeves/pants/socks/enclosed shoes
- Helmet showing the AS/NZS 1698 standard
Bike riders: 
- Full face Helmet showing the AS/NZS 1698 standard
- Riding attire Jacket/long pants including boots that cover the ankle(no sneakers)


Extra Catering vans brought in for this meet so there will be plenty of food, drinks and hot coffee for you to enjoy. We will have some jumpy castles for the kids and a DJ pumping music

If you have friends that hang around in the Vintage, Veteran, Classic, Hotrod, Exotic car or bike scene, encourage them to come for a run. It’s all about the cars!!

Vehicles open to Vintage/Classics cars and bikes, Kustoms, Street Machines, Muscle cars, Lowriders, JDM, Hot Rods and Exotics. Come down for an informal chat about all things Cars/Bikes over a Coffee
We don't care wether its modified, stock, lowered, lifted or vehicles from any age. 
Cars & Coffee Perth are High Octane Coffee Meets are run by Enthusiasts for Enthusiasts keeping the car culture alive

NO Burnouts, chirpies or enthusiastic acceleration in and around the venue!!!
Police will be in attendance

Tools and antisocial behaviour will not be tolerated!!
Please drive responsibly...Your passion; lifestyle and hobby are on show.

Look forward to seeing you at the Plex

Jason and Eleissa

Photo Credit Ashleigh Peake
www.facebook.com/pg/creativefleirephotography
data.name: Cars and Coffee Perth-December End of Year Mega Meet

data.description:
Laadukasta kahvia juhlistetaan neljättä kertaa Pohjois-Euroopan suurimmilla kahvifestivaaleilla Helsingin Kaapelitehtaalla 20.-22.4.2018.
(INFO IN ENGLISH BELOW)

Kevään kuumimmassa tapahtumassa maistellaan laadukkaita kahveja eri puolilta maailmaa yhdellä lipulla.

Tapahtumassa valitaan vuoden kahvi (suodatin ja espresso) sekä yleisö äänestää Suomen parhaan paahtimon ja kahvilan.

Vuoden 2018 festareilla puhutaan erityisesti siitä, miten kahvin kasvualue vaikuttaa makuun ja miten eri maiden kahvilajikkeet eroavat toisistaan. Missä olosuhteissa kahvimarja kasvaa ja mitkä asiat vaikuttavat makuun?

Uutuutena festareilla lanseerataan myös makuparibrunssi!

Tapahtumassa oppii kaiken kahvista, muun muassa valmistamaan kahvia erilaisilla menetelmillä, tunnistamaan makuvivahteita ja makupareja sekä huoltamaan ja puhdistamaan laitteita. Lisäksi voit seurata, kuinka raakapapuja paahdetaan.

Kokopäivälippujen lisäksi tapahtumaan myydään viime kerrasta tuttuja sessiolippuja (aamupäivä- ja iltapäivälippuja) lauantaille ja sunnuntaille.

Festivaaleilla saa vinkkejä kahvihetkien parantamiseen baristoilta ja muilta ammattilaisilta. Festivaalitunnelmaa luovat myös DJ:t, kahvidrinkit, herkut ja esiintyjät.

Pssst. Tapahtumassa myös salateehuone...

Nettisivut: www.helsinkicoffeefestival.com

The biggest coffee festival in the Nordics, Helsinki Coffee Festival is here to stay!

Join the coffee revolution in Finland and learn everything about coffee on 20-22.4.2018 at the Cable Factory, Helsinki.

At the festival it's possible to test different coffees and coffee equipment as well as learn from the baristas at the stands and coffee labs how to make quality coffee at home. Other programme include panel discussions, as well as coffee brunch!

The filter coffee and espresso of the year will be chosen at the festival as well as the best coffee shop and roastery in Finland, which is voted by the audience.

The festival atmosphere is created by the hottest DJs, tasty coffee drinks, delicacies and other interesting programme.

Website: www.helsinkicoffeefestival.com
data.name: Helsinki Coffee Festival 2018

Terveisin,

Drink&Draw emännät Salla ja Fredrika

The Coffee Show

Είσαι γνώστης του καφέ, αλλά θες να διευρύνεις τους ορίζοντές σου σε ό,τι αφορά στον ευαίσθητο αυτό καρπό και την ανάδειξη των χαρακτηριστικών του; Σ’ αρέσει στην παραδοσιακή μορφή του μορφή, αλλά θες να ανακαλύψεις κι εκείνη που προκύπτει, όταν παντρεύεται με την μοντέρνα;

To Coffee Show που θα διεξαχθεί την άνοιξη του 2018 17 & 18 Απριλίου στο Athinais Cultural Center, Καστοριάς 34-36, Βοτανικός, Αθήνα. 

Καταξιωμένες εταιρείες με μακροχρόνια και εξελικτική πορεία σε ό,τι αφορά στην τέχνη του καφέ, αλλά και φιλόδοξες startup, με φρέσκια οπτική και καινοτόμες προσεγγίσεις, θα παρουσιάσουν νέα προϊόντα και trends.

Η έκθεση αυτή baristi και επαγγελματιών του κλάδου έχει στόχο την εκπαίδευση, την ενημέρωση γύρω από τις νέες τεχνικές παρασκευής και σερβιρίσματος του καφέ, την κατάρτιση των ανθρώπων του κλάδου, με απώτερο σκοπό και την ανάπτυξη του ίδιου, την παρουσίαση καινοτόμων εργαλείων κι εξοπλισμού, αλλά και την γνωριμία με τα προϊόντα μέσα από διαδικασίες γευσιγνωσίας. 

Μέσα από τα σεμινάρια και τις παρουσιάσεις, που θα πραγματοποιούνται καθ’ όλη τη διάρκεια του διημέρου, από τους καλύτερους Έλληνες και διεθνείς γνώστες του είδους, ο επισκέπτης θα έρθει επίσης σε επαφή με επιτυχημένα και καινοτόμα business models.

Η έκθεση απευθύνεται μόνο σε επαγγελματίες.
Ωράριο λειτουργίας: 10.00 – 19.00

data.description:
After his mind-blowingly successful residency at Hï Ibiza, multi-award-winning DJ and producer, Black Coffee, returns to Shimmy Beach Club this December for a second season, with 5 exclusive Friday night shows. With his latest gold rated EP aptly named “The Journey Continues”, Shimmy Beach Club is thrilled to continue their journey with the now world-renowned homegrown superstar and welcome him back to the iconic Shimmy stage.

Black Coffee’s residency will form part of Shimmy Beach Club’s annual Summer Calling campaign and is indeed a highlight on the calendar, with last year’s shows all sold out weeks in advance. The premier party venue balances the style of international party life and the laid-back atmosphere of Cape Town, making it a stylish venue to rival Ibiza’s beach club scenes. This year Black Coffee will be joined by a fresh line-up of local DJs on the decks, including Da Capo and Enoo Napo, contributing to what promises to be a big night out.

data.description:
Taller dirigido a Baristas o Personas que tengan un conocimiento básico de café.

El objetivo del taller es presentar aquellas guías básicas que corresponden al buen manejo y desarrollo de tu negocio, específicamente enfocado en los ‘coffee shops’ (mercadeo, administración, finanzas, recursos humanos). También contará con un foro de expertos en la industria que compartirán sus vivencias, experiencias y expertise dentro de la industria del café.

Recurso: Erica Reyes, Master Barista & Q Grader. Propietaria de la Escuela de Café y Baristas de Puerto Rico.

Panelistas: Érica Reyes (Café Cola'o y Escuela de Café y Baristas), Virgina Rivera (Directora de mercadeo Starbucks PR), Abimael Ruiz, (Café Don Ruiz), Jorge Hernández (PR Coffee Roasters), Mateo Cidre (Tienda Los Cidrines), Anthony Berrios (Banktech)

data.description:
Official announcement: Fashion talk #facetofaceseries12, Fashion Marketing from offline to online: How brands stand out? - Để thương hiệu trỗi dậy!

Khách mời: Marketing Director Trần Hà Mi

Bạn thân mến. Vào tháng 4/2017, ở Fashion Talk số 4, cuộc trò chuyện có chủ đề: Fashion Marketing Chiến lược và cảm hứng? cùng chị Trần Hà Mi đã để lại nhiều ấn tượng và bài học quan trọng. Rất nhiều bạn bày tỏ niềm mong muốn có thêm một cuộc trò chuyện nữa, vì bức tranh marketing thời trang thực sự rộng lớn và người trẻ không biết phải xoay xở thế nào trên "đường băng ấy".

Giờ đây, chúng tôi mời chị trở lại lần nữa, với một chủ đề thuộc về Fashion Marketing 4.0.

Trong kỷ nguyên số, nơi Pinterest như Look book kiểu mới; Google, Youtube là những thư viện thời trang mở (Google vừa ra mắt dự án We wear culture); Instagram ghi dấu văn hoá đại chúng; Facebook & Facebook live! trở thành kênh truyền thông quan trọng; Amazon, Net-A-Porter chào mừng bạn đến thế giới thời trang mới, chỉ qua một cú click chuột...

Những sàn diễn luôn không bao giờ chết. Tuy nhiên, luật chơi mới là gì? Làm thế nào Để thương hiệu trỗi dậy?

F.A.C.E Fashion Workshop thân mời bạn tham dự Fashion talk #facetofaceseries12: Fashion Marketing from offline to online: How brands stand

Thông tin về Ms Trần Hà Mi:
Chị Trần Hà Mi có bằng Thạc sĩ về Quản trị kinh doanh và Marketing thời trang tại ESMOD International ở Paris, từng làm việc tại Circus&Ci ở kinh đô thời trang này và làm việc ba tháng tại tạp chí Vogue Mỹ.
Cô trở về Việt Nam làm phụ trách Marketing cho Gucci Việt Nam một thời gian ngắn trước khi chuyển đến Ringier Việt Nam ở vị trí giám đốc Marketing Elle Việt Nam từ năm 2011 đến 2014. Trước khi chuyển đến vị trí Head of Marketing at Leflair, a premium flash-sale e-commerce website.
Chị Hà Mi là người sáng lập #hashtag #unghontkviet với sự tham gia của rất nhiều người có ảnh hưởng trong ngành công nghiệp thời trang nội địa.

Save the date:
F.A.C.E pop-up cafe & Open Day Saigon:
Thời gian: 10g00, 26/11/2017, 
Địa điểm: Dinosys cafe, 204 Pasteur, Q.3
Form đăng kí: https://goo.gl/forms/I5p71qKYDkssSpPp2

F.A.C.E pop-up cafe & Open Day Hanoi:
Thời gian: 10g00, 10/12/2017, 
Địa điểm: Toong co-working space, 8 Tràng Thi, Q. Hoàn Kiếm
Form đăng kí: https://goo.gl/forms/whxr6N6kJrUroVjl1

* Dịp này, workshop giảng dạy về Fashion marketing cũng được diễn ra tại F.A.C.E Fashion Workshop trong 2 ngày, 9-10/12/2017. Liên hệ Hotline để biết thêm thông tin.

data.description: Join HistoryMiami Museum and explore one of Miami’s trendiest and most dynamic neighborhoods – the Wynwood Art District. Learn how this textile warehouse and immigrant neighborhood, formerly known as “Little San Juan,” is quickly becoming the world’s largest outdoor art gallery. Stroll past vast murals and various street art displays, as you listen to the history of graffiti from the advent of written language to today. Hear stories of the artists, residents, and developers who made Wynwood home to over seventy galleries, five museums, and seven art complexes.
data.name: Wynwood: A History of Street Art
